title: mythicmobs如何让怪物不掉落原版物品
author: wanglucheng666

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
在mob的设置中添加
  Options:
  - PreventOtherDrops: true复制代码
例如
WITHER:
  Display: '&4&l凋灵'
  Health: 2000
  Damage: 800
  Drops:
  - diamond 10to20 0.5
  - emerald 10to15 0.2
  - nether_star 1 0.8
  Options:
  - PreventOtherDrops: true复制代码

replies.author: 幽冥冥灬
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 幽冥冥灬 于 2020-7-11 11:26 编辑 

Options项下有个 PreventOtherDrops 设置，将其设置为 true 即可
这是阻止生物死亡时掉落自带掉落物的
例如：

怪物1:
  Type: WITHER_SKELETON
  Display: '&6Skeleton King'
  Health: 500
  Damage: 10
  Options:
    AlwaysShowName: true
    MovementSpeed: 0.2
    MaxCombatDistance: 25
    PreventOtherDrops: true

replies.author: MCLink
replies.txt_content:
最下方  Options:后加入
  - PreventOtherDrops: true（true为禁止，false为允许）
